description: Information about an image file generated by an imaging experiment.
title: image_file

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

schema_type.description: The type of the metadata schema entity.

provenance.description: Provenance information provided by the system.

number_of_fields.description: The number of x y fields in one z plane of the image.

y_field_size.description: The pixel size in the y dimension for a single field of view (tile).

x_field_size.description: The pixel size in the x dimension for a single field of view (tile).

number_of_focal_planes.description: The number of focal planes in the z stack in the image.

total_field_microns.description: Microns covered by a field in x, y, and z. Z includes all focal planes in a single file.
Microns covered by a field in x, y, and z. Z includes all focal planes in a single file.

overlapping_fields_of_view.description: Are fileds of view (tiles) overlapping in the image?

imaging_channel.description: Information about the imaging channels in the image.
